ygData.subject: Re: purple and such
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ahhhh.  That could well be the case.  I ll have to ask some of my friends what color my name is. Those are the sort of annoying bugs that Verant should
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:00 PM 6/29/99 -0400, Dan Harmon wrote:
>When I mentioned that to a guildmate, the told me that when you go into
>options & go un-anon, everyone else sees you as blue, though you look purple
>to yourself (similar to the HIDE bug).

Ahhhh. That could well be the case. I'll have to ask some of my friends
what color my name is.

Those are the sort of annoying bugs that Verant should just fix and get it
over with, like strumming your flute when you should be playing your drum.
They're small things that make the game look shabby and frayed around the
edges, or, as with the Hide bug, make the skill very dangerous and random
to use.

Bob
